pages.text: The $(item)Totem Aspect$() is one of the most powerful aspects you can create. When triggered, it first checks your inventory for any $(item)Totems of Undying$(). Should it find one, it will consume it, restore $(thing)15 HP$() and go on cooldown for 10 seconds. If you don't have any totems, only $(thing)5 HP$() will be restored and the aspect will have a 2.5 minute cooldown.
In both of these cases, should the damage have been lethal, the health restored by the $(thing)Totem Aspect$() will $(thing)save you$().
